Introduction
This topic contains information on the payment of the annual clothing allowance for incarcerated Veterans, including
provisions of Section 502 of
PL 104-275
, and
payment
during the initial period of incarceration
, and
when the Veteran is
incarcerated for the entire clothing allowance year
, and
released from incarceration during the clothing allowance year
.
